title: Princess Chokomaka Of Laid-Back Castle
alternative_title: のんびりじょうのちょこまかひめ ; Nonbiri-jou no Chokomakahime
status: のんびりじょうのちょこまかひめ ; Nonbiri-jou no Chokomakahime
description:
Description :
        Princess Chokomaka ('restless' - her real name is Princess Chocolate Cream) is a princess who lives in Laid-Back Castle with her parents, the king and queen. Princess Choko gets into lots of shenanigans, giving everybody a hard time. She can't settle down in one place - whatever she does, chaos follows!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: But It's Hot Out!
